## Survivorship Epidemiology: 
Descriptive and causal inference about post-critical illness survivor health, quality of life, and socioeconomic outcomes;

## Foundations for Pharmacoequity: 
Data provenance, lineage, and epidemiological analysis methods for health equity, focusing on race and ethnicity data use in pharmacoepidemiology; 

## Causing Careers:
epidemiological approaches to education and career planning, delivery, and evaluation.
